.cli_group.field_description: a mutually exclusive group of arguments in cli

.cli_metavar.field_description: an alternative name for argument variable in cli help

.cli_help.field_description: a brief description of argument in cli help

.cli_flags.field_description: a list of flags for optional arguments in cli

.cli_action.field_description: a special argparse action associated with argument

.cli_default.field_description: argument key not included in cli options

.cli_position.field_description: number to designate order of a positional argument
